mapper.insert:
insert into alert_instance (gmt_create, gmt_modified, def_id, app_instance_id, app_component_instance_id, metric_instance_id, metric_instance_labels, gmt_occur, source, level, receivers, content) values
(#{item.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.defId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.appInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.appComponentInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.metricInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.metricInstanceLabels,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gmtOccur,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receivers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select DATE_FORMAT(gmt_occur, #{dateFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) aggTime, count(1) as cnt from alert_instance where
app_instance_id = #{appInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
gmt_occur >= #{startTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and gmt_occur <= #{endTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by aggTime
